nodes.text: Maysano was a wanted Lutrillian criminal who was active during the Clone Wars. Maysano had a file in the Jedi Archives on Coruscant. When the Togruta Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano lost her lightsaber on that planet, she and the Jedi librarian Jocasta Nu briefly considered Maysano as a suspect. At another point during the war, Tano consulted Maysano's file in the library while investigating a possible assassination of which she had experienced fleeting visions. According to Maysano's file, the Lutrillian was wanted for murder and last had been spotted on the planet Rodia. The mugshot accompanying the file showed Maysano as a white-skinned Lutrillian with gray hair and pink eyes, wearing a gray sweater and a brown jacket.

Maysano appears in two episodes of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. In both episodes—2010's "Lightsaber Lost" and "Assassin"—Maysano's name, last known location, and alleged crime appear in aurebesh type around the photograph.
